posts.post_title: 1895 Mayo Cut Plug  N300  Ed Cartwright
posts.post_content: 1895 Mayo Cut Plug  N300   Ed Cartwright---Nice card but left border looks to be trimmed---if someone did it, must have been early (really off)--but anyway it doesnt measure up----No Creases  Clean Back---looking for a offer over $150---U name it---check scans----thanks, Don
